definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
droplet infection (disease transmission from sneezing, coughing etc)

sentences.english: The epidemic was stopped before the annual pilgrimage to Mecca got under way.
sentences.chinese: 這傳染病在一年一度進行麥加朝聖之前停止。

sentences.english: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它不會傳染或寄居於死的或乾的植體組織。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近來，蜱媒傳染病引起了國內傳染病界的重視。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近來，蜱媒傳染病引起了國內傳染病界的重視。

sentences.english: He gave me his sore throat.
People catch all kinds of infections in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 人們在冬天易患各種各樣的傳染病。

sentences.english: The virus has such high infectivity that it soon spread to the whole area.
sentences.chinese: 這病毒傳染性如此強，不久就傳遍整個地區。

sentences.english: The vaccine was used to protect the whole population against infection.
sentences.chinese: 冬天人們易患多種傳染病。

sentences.english: Q2. Can swine influenza infect humans?
In low-resource settings, infectious diseases continue to be the major killer.
sentences.chinese: 在資源匱乏地區，傳染病仍然是主要殺手。

sentences.english: Distrust can be contagious. But, so can trust. (Robbins Stacia, British writer.
sentences.chinese: 不信任有傳染性，但是不信任也如此。

sentences.english: This is both contagious and deadly and must be avoided at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 這會傳染且是致命的，必須不惜一切代價加以避免。

sentences.english: Rat-fleas communicate a disease to man.
sentences.chinese: 鼠蚤會把疾病傳染給人。

sentences.english: The space periodic solution and chaos of a class of infectious disease model are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論一類傳染病模型的空間週期解及混沌問題。

sentences.english: Farcinia is spreading seriously and those families which raise cattles must take measures against it.
sentences.chinese: 疽病傳染嚴重，養家畜的家庭一定要做好防範。

sentences.english: There were no differences in noninfectious complications or in mortality.
sentences.chinese: 非傳染性併發症和死亡率未見差異。

definition: just in case/if by any chance/contingency
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to have a high temperature (from illness)/to have a fever
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
